name: Purgatory (itch) (LawLewis, GamerJames)
description:
Fight an endless horde of the dead and decide who is good and who is evil. 

In this first person shooter you play as The Purger, an angel of death who sends souls trapped in purgatory to either Heaven or Hell. Your heavenly gun, Azrael, will send good people on their way to the pearly gates while your hellish gun, Asmodeus, will send those who hide their true selves behind a mask straight on the highway to hell.

See how long you can survive and comment your high scores! 

Controls:
Left Mouse Button - Fire Heavenly Gun
Right Mouse Button - Fire Hellish Gun
Q - Reload Heavenly Gun
E - Reload Hellish Gun

This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2022 over a span of 2 days. 

Made in Unreal Engine 4. 
Assets used are from Synty Studios and Mixamo.  
Audio is from Freesound.org and YouTube Audio Library.
